hopobject.name: testkiosk
hopobject.body: The phone will have a universal number and universal network.The device connects to a single network via 3G/4G/Wi-Fi/ and the user can socialize on the network.They can share pictures,videos,music and files on it.They can make video and audio calls form it.
hopobject.shortdesc: A project to make an cloud communication device on a BeagleBoard .
